examine if you had in fact fixed it.

[36mThe Antechamber[0;37m
     This is a round antechamber that leads to the private quarters of the
high sorcerer through the doorway to the north. The round room has large
tapestries all around the walls. The ceiling of this room has the designs
of the Dark Queen etched in marble. The walls of this room are also made of
white marble. On the floor you see the engraving of a large emblem of the
dragonarmy. Two large leather sofas are pushed to the southern wall where
visitors sit and wait. You feel a sense of calm in this dreaded tower, a
strange sensation indeed.

[36mThe Main Chamber[0;37m
    You now stand in the large chamber at the top of the tower. This is the
great worship chamber for Mordred. In the center of the room, you see a
circular dais about two feet above the ground and on it stands an artifact
of the Dark Queen. The ceiling here is high and domed, there are exits
leading in all four directions. The north appears to be the sorcerer's
private chamber while west you see a large guest's bedroom. Looking east
you see a large room of what looks like the personal laboratory where the
High Sorcerer conducts his secret draconian experiments.
